intro.heading: International Travel Made Simple
intro.description: At Sweden Relocators, we make international travel simple, transparent, and stress-free through our Global Visa Program Initiative. Our service is designed for individuals, families, students, and professionals who want reliable visa support without the confusion of navigating multiple embassy systems.
intro.toolLink: Our unique one universal visa form allows you to apply for multiple destinations with the same information, saving time and reducing errors through our secure web portal and mobile app.

categories.heading: Visa Categories We Support
categories.intro: Our program covers major destinations worldwide
categories.additional: Other destinations are also supported through customized embassy-based solutions.

purposes.title: Tourism
purposes.description: Proof of accommodation, health insurance, and financial coverage arranged for smooth approval

purposes.title: Visiting Family or Friends
purposes.description: Verified invitation letters, sponsorship documents, and relationship evidence prepared

purposes.title: EU Family Reunification
purposes.description: Detailed review of housing, income, and residency compliance for family permits

purposes.title: Business and Conference Travel
purposes.description: Corporate invitations, sponsorship confirmations, and professional documentation arranged

purposes.title: Study Abroad
purposes.description: Admission letters, proof of funds, and educational credentials verified

purposes.title: Short-Term Work Assignments
purposes.description: Employer contracts and labor compliance checks completed

purposes.title: Medical Treatment
purposes.description: Hospital confirmations, medical records, and financial sponsorship prepared

purposes.title: Cultural and Sports Events
purposes.description: Event registrations and official invitations compiled

steps.title: Register
steps.description: Sign up via our website or app to create an account and receive your unique Client ID

steps.title: Assessment
steps.description: Our team reviews your purpose, eligibility, and required documents for your destination

steps.title: Preparation
steps.description: We create your complete application file according to embassy standards

steps.title: Appointment
steps.description: We secure and confirm your embassy appointment, with a call to check your readiness

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: Your final file is delivered to your home with all appointment details included

steps.title: Submission
steps.description: Attend the appointment with your passport and complete file

steps.title: Tracking and Reuse
steps.description: Track progress in our portal and reuse your information for future visa applications

languages.heading: Multilingual Assistance
languages.description: To make sure language is never a barrier, we provide multilingual support in English, Swedish, Urdu, Arabic, Punjabi, Serbian, Kurdish, Persian, and many other languages. Our consultants explain visa rules in the language you are most comfortable with.

faqs.question: Do you arrange hotel bookings and travel insurance for visas?
faqs.answer: Yes, we provide embassy-approved hotel reservations, flight itineraries, and travel insurance to strengthen your visa application.

faqs.question: How can I check if I am eligible for a visa?
faqs.answer: Our assessment tool and experts analyze your documents and travel history to confirm eligibility for your chosen destination.

faqs.question: Do you handle student and family visas?
faqs.answer: Yes, we manage student applications, family visits, and EU family reunification with complete documentation and compliance checks.

faqs.question: Can I apply for multiple visas with the same file?
faqs.answer: Yes, our system allows you to reuse your stored documents for different countries and visa types, saving time and effort.

benefits.title: Universal Visa Form

cta.heading: Ready to Travel the World?
cta.description: With Sweden Relocators Global Visa Program Initiative, we combine technology, expertise, and personal support to make international travel simple. Get started with your visa application today.
cta.subtext: Our team will guide you through every step to ensure your application succeeds.
